body_html: I think for illustration purposes, the current code might be useful to show that these functions do return objects that could be used, even though at the moment the side effects are that they add to the graph. What do you think?

body: I think for illustration purposes, the current code might be useful to show that these functions do return objects that _could_ be used, even though at the moment the side effects are that they add to the graph. What do you think?
